nodes.text: The Survival medpac was a model of emergency medpac produced by Athakam Medtech and available in the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Designed for ease of use, the medpac carried bacta patches, basic drugs, medical tools and knives, blood coagulators, synthflesh applicators and more. A single Survival medpac cost 100 credits.
The Survival medpac was created for the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013.
